Bookmarks: Cut out the cards to create bookmarks with a unique touch. You can add a personal message or a small image to make it more special.
Game Pieces: Use the cards as game pieces for board games or card games. You can also use them as tokens or pawns.
Gift Tags: Use the cards as gift tags for presents. You can write a message or draw a picture on the card to make it more personalized.
Coasters: Cut out the cards to create coasters that can protect your furniture from water marks and spills. You can also add a non-slip backing to prevent them from sliding around.
Party Favors: Use the cards as party favors for a themed party. You can customize them with the party's theme and give them out as a memento.
